verses.name: Joshua 9:12
verses.text: This our bread we took hot for our provision out of our houses on the day we came forth to go unto you; but now, behold, it is dry, and it is mouldy:

verses.name: Joshua 9:13
verses.text: And these bottles of wine, which we filled, were new; and, behold, they be rent: and these our garments and our shoes are become old by reason of the very long journey.

verses.name: Joshua 9:14
verses.text: And the men took of their victuals, and asked not counsel at the mouth of the Lord.
